sentences.en: A banquet was given in honor of the distinguished guests.
sentences.cn: 宴会是为了向贵宾们致敬而举行的.

sentences.en: For the French team, winning tomorrow’s game is a matter of national honor.
sentences.cn: 对法国队来说，打赢明天的比赛事关国家荣誉。

sentences.en: He called for quiet and announced that the next song was in our honor.
sentences.cn: 他叫大家安静，然后宣布下一首歌要送给我们。

sentences.en: He is unworthy to receive such honor.
sentences.cn: 他不配得到这种荣誉.

sentences.en: He swore by his honor he would return the bike.
sentences.cn: 他以自己的名誉发誓,保证归还自行车.

sentences.en: He tried hard to vindicate his honor.
sentences.cn: 他拼命维护自己的名誉.

sentences.en: He was determined to retrieve his honor.
sentences.cn: 他决心恢复名誉.

sentences.en: His honor remained intact.
sentences.cn: 他的名誉完整无损.

sentences.en: I feel honor bound to repay the money I borrowed.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有责任归还我借的钱.

sentences.en: I was honor bound to admit that she had done the work.
sentences.cn: 出于道义上的责任我不得不承认她已经做了工作

sentences.en: It is an honor to have you here, sir.
sentences.cn: 先生，大驾光临，深感荣幸。

sentences.en: It is impossible to honor her with the award.
sentences.cn: 奖品授给她是不可能的.

sentences.en: It's quite an honor to have two men fighting over me.
sentences.cn: 有两个人争着要我,我感到很荣幸.

sentences.en: The Chinese make a point of their personal honor.
sentences.cn: 中国人特别重视个人荣誉.

sentences.en: The stadium was named in honor of the club’s first chairman.
sentences.cn: 该体育馆以俱乐部的第一任主席命名以示纪念。

sentences.en: They ran up a flag in honor of the president's visit.
sentences.cn: 为了欢迎总统的来访,他们升起了一面旗子.

sentences.en: To graduate Cum laude is to graduate with honor.
sentences.cn: 优等毕业即光荣的毕业.

sentences.en: We gave a dinner in honor of our guests.
sentences.cn: 我们设宴款待客人.

sentences.en: We should say and do nothing to the injury of any one. It is not only a matter of principle, but also the path of peace and honor.
sentences.cn: 任何有损他人的言语或者事情我们都应该避免。这不仅是一种做人的原则，而且也是通向平和的人际关系、获得他人尊敬之道。 。

sentences.en: Would you honor me by dining with me tonight?
sentences.cn: 今晚您能赏光和我一起吃饭 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 荣誉的；名誉的；道义上的
受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的
荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的
名誉学位；获名誉学位者；名誉团体
尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据

phrases.tran_cn: 道义上有责任做：由于受惠者个人的正直而迫使其承担某种责任
向…致敬，向…表示敬意；为庆祝…

trans.tran_en: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud
